name: DodgeMaster
description:
This is a short demo of game that i was working on for a GMTK Game Jam 2019.

It was a lot of fun doing and i hope i will have time for another game jams, and of course to expand my little game.

As for topic the game explains itself in the beginning, yet i prefer this one:

I'm the ONLY ONE person that worked on this project :)
